generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road surface with visible lane markings, extending into the distance, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: There is a paved area on the right side of the road, bordered by a curb and adjacent to a stone wall, which is designated for pedestrians or cyclists and thus qualifies as a sidewalk.
- building: A large white building with multiple windows and a roof is visible in the background, which is clearly a building.
- wall: A stone wall runs along the right side of the road, which is an individual standing wall.
- vegetation: Numerous trees with green leaves are visible along both sides of the road and in the background, which fall under the category of vegetation.
- terrain: There are areas of grass and soil visible on the left side of the road and along the sidewalk, which are classified as terrain.
- person: A person is visible riding a bicycle in the middle of the road, which is a person.
- rider: The person riding the bicycle is classified as a rider.
- car: A white van and a blue car are parked on the left side of the road, which are cars.
- traffic sign: A blue circular traffic sign with a white arrow pointing to the right is visible on a pole in the middle of the road, which is a traffic sign.
- pole: Several vertical poles are visible along the road, including one holding the traffic sign, which are poles.
